Union1 keyGenerate(output(CleDataSD as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> RecordID
RecordID derive(DateExt = "",
		DocVte_Long = "",
		DateCRE = "",
		{ATC Corrigé} = iif(  instr({ATC Corrigé}, "#")>0, "", {ATC Corrigé}),
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} = iif(  instr({Agence commerciale corrigé}, "#")>0, "", {Agence commerciale corrigé})) ~> DateExtDocVteLongDateCRE
DateExtDocVteLongDateCRE select(mapColumn(
		OrgCial = {Org. commerciale},
		CanalDist = {Canal distribution},
		SectAct = {Secteur d'activité},
		DocVte = {Document de vente},
		Poste,
		Date = {Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		DRCde = {Agence commerciale corrigé},
		ATCCde = {ATC Corrigé},
		CliCde = {Donneur d'ordre},
		CliLiv = {Récept. de march.},
		CliFac = {Destinataire facture},
		NoArt = Article,
		TypDocVte = {Type doc. vente},
		TypPoste = {Type de poste},
		NoLiv = Livraison,
		TypLiv = {Type de livraison},
		TypPostLiv = {Type poste Livraison},
		NoFac = Facture,
		TypFac = {Type de facture},
		TypPostFac = {Type poste Facture},
		Mois = {Mois calendrier},
		An = {Année civile},
		RaiCde = {Motif commande},
		QtCde = {Qté cdée},
		ValNet = {CA cdé},
		QtLiv = {Qté livrée},
		ValLiv = {CA livré},
		QtFac = {Qté facturée},
		ValFac = {CA facturé},
		StdCost = {Cout standard cdé},
		FabCost = {Cout fabrication},
		StdCostLiv = {Cout standard livré},
		StdCostFac = {Cout standard facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
AC, AP union(byName: true)~> Union1
Rename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['FacturationBW.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortieFacturationBW

source(output(
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Code client livré} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		quantite as string,
		ca as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque as string,
		marque_code as string,
		canal_distribution_final as string,
		{nom du canal} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)} as string,

		N3localedesignation as string,

		yearmonth as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dataCommerciale
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10000,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PLATEFORMES
source(output(
		{Année} as string,
		Documentation as string,
		Marque as string,
		Cible as string,
		{Périmètre} as string,
		Levier as string,
		Canal as string,
		{Hiérarchie inclues} as string,
		{Hiérarchies exclues} as string,
		Type as string,
		{Valeur Annuelle} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> levierPerformance
source(output(
		{Année} as integer,
		{Mois début} as integer,
		{Mois fin} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> filtre
dataCommerciale filter({affecte/non_affecte}=="affecté") ~> filtreAffectation
dropColumns derive(HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " "),
		ATC = toInteger(ATC),
		ca_final = toDouble(replace(ca_final, ",", "."))) ~> cleansingInput
PLATEFORMES derive(HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansingPlateformes
cleansingInput, cleansingPlateformes join(cleansingInput@HubSAPid == cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateformes
innerPlateformes derive({Type de vente} = WholeSalerID) ~> innerTypeDeVente
cleansingInput, cleansingPlateformes join(cleansingInput@HubSAPid == cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftPlateforme
fullLeftPlateforme filter(isNull(cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid)) ~> outerLeftPlateforme
outerLeftPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = cleansingInput@HubSAPid,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque = marque_name,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation = N5LocalDesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonLeft
dropColumnsInCommonLeft derive({Type de vente} = "Ventes directes") ~> leftTypeDeVente
dropColumnsInCommonInner, leftTypeDeVente union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
innerTypeDeVente select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = cleansingInput@HubSAPid,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		marque = marque_name,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_name,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation = N5LocalDesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		{Type de vente}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonInner
fullLeftUnion select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		canal_jointure = canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		{Type de vente},
		OrgCm = marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
Rename derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		id_canal_final = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		canal = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		id_canal = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		{Canal Final} = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		OrgCm = toInteger(OrgCm),
		canal_final = replace(lower(canal_final), " ", ""),
		year = toInteger(year),
		N1locale = replace(N1locale, " ", "")) ~> typeParse
typeParse filter(!isNull(ATC) && !isNull(distributeur)) ~> ATCandDistributeurNotNull
Filter3 derive({diffus/chantier} = iif(Cible!="DR", trim(split(Cible, " ")[2], " "), "diffus,chantier"),
		ID_KPI = "Sum_XRow_"+toString(RecordID)) ~> newColumn
uniqueLevier keyGenerate(output(RecordID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> RecordID
newColumn select(mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie = {Hiérarchie inclues},
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(Marque = split(Marque, "."),
		Canal = split(Canal, ","),
		Hierarchie = split(Hierarchie, ","),
		diffusChantier = split({diffus/chantier}, ",")) ~> splitting
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Hierarchie),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenHierarchie
FlattenDiffusChantier foldDown(unroll(Marque),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenMarque
FlattenMarque foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
filtreCalcul select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {plateforme/vente directe},
		data_origin = {origine de la ligne},
		reference = {code produit},
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = {code client plateforme livree},
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final = quantite,
		ca_final = ca,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString = {Code client livré},
		marque_name = marque_code,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe = {Hiérarchgroupe},
		Hierarchielocale = {Hiérarchlocale},
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation = N1groupedesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation = N2groupedesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation = N3groupedesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation = N4groupedesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation = N5groupedesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation = N6groupedesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation = N7groupedesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation = N1localedesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation = N2localedesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation = N3localedesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation = N4localedesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation = N6localedesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation = N7localedesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque = marque_code,
		ATC = {ATC Performance},
		ATC1 = {ATC livré},
		ATC2 = {ATC offre},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		N5LocalDesignation = N5localedesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
RecordID filter(!isNull(Documentation) || !isNull(Levier)) ~> Filter3
levierPerformance derive({Libellé levié} = Levier+"-"+Documentation+" "+Cible+" "+{Périmètre}+" "+iif({Valeur Annuelle}=="YES", "Annuel", "Mensuel"),
		jointure = 1) ~> libelleLevier
deleteColumns aggregate(groupBy({Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		{Hiérarchie inclues},
		{Hiérarchies exclues},
		Type,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	{Libellé levié} = max({Libellé levié})) ~> uniqueLevier
uniqueLevier aggregate(groupBy({Libellé levié}),
	count = count({Libellé levié})) ~> Aggregate1
FlattenHierarchie derive(Marque = toInteger(Marque),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		Hierarchie = replace(Hierarchie, " ", ""),
		{diffus/chantier} = replace(lower({diffus/chantier}), " ", "")) ~> typeParseLevier
splitting foldDown(unroll(diffusChantier),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier} = diffusChantier,
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenDiffusChantier
filtre derive(jointure = 1) ~> clejointure
filtreAffectation derive(jointure = 1) ~> cleJointureBase
cleJointureBase, clejointure join(cleJointureBase@jointure == clejointure@jointure,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ajoutColonneFiltre
ajoutColonneFiltre filter(toInteger(year)=={Année} && toInteger(month)>={Mois début} && toInteger(month)<={Mois fin}) ~> filtreCalcul
libelleLevier, clejointure join(libelleLevier@jointure == clejointure@jointure,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(toInteger(levierPerformance@{Année})==filtre@{Année}) ~> yearFilter
yearFilter select(mapColumn(
		{Année} = levierPerformance@{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		{Hiérarchie inclues},

		{Qté Mois A} = toDouble({Qté Mois A})) ~> caEcoulementAndAgenceClient
caEcoulementAndAgenceClient filter({Agence du client} != '') ~> FiltreAgenceClient
OrganisationMabilleSonac derive(POSid = replace( replace({POSid}, " ", ""),'ETS','' )) ~> POSid
POSid filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> FiltrePOSid

		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),

	),

ecoulement filter(!isNull({Quantité})) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull derive({Quantité} = toDouble(replace({Quantité}, ",", "."))) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dépot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),

		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation

		{Qté facturée} = toDouble({Qt� vente directe}),
		yearmonth = trim(yearmonth, " "),
		Article = trim(Article, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> sumQuantity

	&& {Référence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},

	&& {Référence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes

		annee1 = split( {Mois début}, "/")[2],
		mois2 = toInteger(split( {Mois fin}, "/")[1]),
		annee2 = split( {Mois fin}, "/")[2],
		Distributeur = iif(WholeSalerID=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif( (instr(WholeSalerID, 'dsc')>0)  || (instr(WholeSalerID, 'cedeo')>0 ) , 'dsc',     iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort',      iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',WholeSalerID)))))) ~> splitAnneeMois

		{Mois fin} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[2],

		Article,

		Livraison as string,

		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as integer,
		{CA facturé} as double,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAP
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonInner
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
dropColumns keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
dropColumnsInCommonInner aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
previousID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextID
nextID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID || {previous Année civile}!={Année civile}, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
joinNewNextID derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Année civile}=={previous Année civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
UnionFacturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon1
dropColumnsInCommon1 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA facturé}/{Qté facturée})) ~> prixUnitaireLeft
prixUnitaireLeft derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> dureePeriodeLeft
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> uniqueWholeSalerID
uniqueWholeSalerID select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> drop
drop derive(join = 1) ~> join
dureePeriodeLeft, join join(dureePeriodeLeft@join == join@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
dropColumnsInCommon derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
dropColumns2, averagePrix union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
Sort2 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addNewKey
changementDePeriodeFiltre select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deletePreviousAndNext
deletePreviousAndNext sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort2
addNewKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNextNew
addNewKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousNewID
previousNewID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPreviousNew
addNewKey, renameToPreviousNew join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewPreviousID
joinNewPreviousID, renameToNextNew join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewNextID
addperiod, dropColumns2 join(dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID == dropColumns2@WholeSalerID
	&& dropColumnsInCommon@Article == dropColumns2@Article,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
join2 filter(isNull(dropColumns2@WholeSalerID) || isNull(dropColumns2@Article)) ~> leftJoin
leftJoin select(mapColumn(
		Article = dropColumnsInCommon@Article,
		prix_unitaire = dropColumnsInCommon@prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période} = dropColumnsInCommon@{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID = dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> averagePrix
